Title: Halter Top Evening Dress with Split

Featured-image: J727-mint-halter-top-evening-dress-with-split_p.jpg

Description: A halter top with peek-a-boo cuts outs and a x shaped crossed straps in the back. The halter top is embellished with sequins and beading. The form fitting A-line design is completed with a high split in the front of the skirt.
